level.heading: History
level.text: (July 16, 1947, 61 Stat. 360, ch. 258, art. V, § 1; repealed pursuant to § 302 of D.C. Law 11-111.)

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 11-111
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-111, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 34-2413.01.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Repeal effective 90 days after meeting of Board: Section 302 of D.C. Law 11-111 repealed this section. However, § 601 of D.C. Law 11-111 provided that title III of the act shall apply 90 days after the initial meeting of the Board established by section 204 of the act.
